Title: The Story of Noodles
Description:
Ah, being here again makes me hungry. Have I ever told you about the time I learned to cook from Sungshin Ironpaw?

Perhaps you can experience it for yourself. Say the word and I will take you to a version of this timeline where you--yes YOU--ran your own noodle stand!

It all began with the Lin family's secret recipe...
ObjectivesText: Talk to Grandmaster Jakkus to complete the scenario Finding the Secret Ingredient.

Objectives.Text: Ask Grandmaster Jakkus to tell you his story
